website_summaries.verdict: Kit ships with both a wheel paint base coat and a clear coat, giving a good value.
pros: Works extremely well on wheels, but you also can use it for vehicle trim and other accessories
Inclusion of clear coat ensures a longer lasting wheel paint, while also creating a really nice glossy look
Works better when you take your time and apply the paint slowly
cons: Can be difficult to achieve a uniform look, as the paint tends to run

customer_reviews.title: Great product of you perp correctly
customer_reviews.text: Pic one is one light coat. Second pic is 5 coats. Piece was chrome and needed it black. I was like this will never stick to chrome but yeah you tube said it will. So I wiped down parts using rubbing alcohol and a micro towel. Let it dry. Then used 3 light coats and waiting 30 minutes on a hot 80 degree day out in sun. And after 5 coats and 2 clear coats and now 2600 miles on parts after shadow the chrome it is still stuck on there and been in rain and washed and pressure washed I am greatly surprised that it staying on chrome. Now I can black out more parts on motorcycle
customer_reviews.author: wmj

customer_reviews.title: Nice change to all the chrome
customer_reviews.text: Got this to change the look of some of the chrome pieces on my truck. I like the color but it didn't quite dry smoothly on some pieces. Not enough to do it over. It just seemed like some pieces had dust or dirt granules on them before it was sprayed which in fact I made sure they were each cleaned properly and sprayed in a well ventilated but confined area free from blowing dust and dirt. I still installed the pieces and it looks pretty good. I don't regret doing it. Just wish the up close look of it didn't show traces of lint or dirt.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effortless. Worked like a charm on polished chrome
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this on a chrome light fixture. It effortlessly turned the base / canopy to black. Need to shake really really really well before spraying. Practice first on a piece of paper to test the color and motion for spraying.
customer_reviews.author: Bala Narasimhan

customer_reviews.title: Intense prep work
customer_reviews.text: Other than having some minor runs here and there, this product did the job. The end result was exactly what I was looking for because I put on 5 coats. No greenish effect what so ever and quality overcame my expectations. If I need to paint any wheels to black in the future, I would definitely use it again against regular wheel paint.
customer_reviews.author: do h.

customer_reviews.title: but didnt turn out quite like i
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, but didnt turn out quite like i hoped
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with the look, then this happened...
customer_reviews.text: I followed all the tips and suggestions for using this product on my front bumper. And I was satisfied with the look (4 stars) but then I was testing some removable vinyl cut outs to cover the holes on my bumper, and when I pulled them up, most of the paint came off. Very disappointing to say the least, especially since I followed all the cleaning and prep work that was recommended. This was after about a week of cure time.
customer_reviews.author: Ske

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, nothing special about it
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, it works, but color and finish are nowhere near that represented on their web site or even the box. I've used it on several items now, from OEM chrome-plated emblems to self-made parts in various materials (mostly acrylic). It's a lightly speckled black with a light metal flake, plus a clear coat. I've used other common (and much cheaper) brands that are much closer to the color they show on their web site.
customer_reviews.author: EFlyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Please Don’t
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews. Please to don’t ruin your items with this product. I followed the instructions perfectly for a chrome piece of trim. Very “blotchy” and almost had a green-ish tint to it.
customer_reviews.author: Penn33State

customer_reviews.title: Uneven coating
customer_reviews.text: The product adds more blue than grey but it can smoke some appearance. The tip on the can is about as accurate as you’d expect and that’s not that great as it’s not uniform so neither is the resulting smoke
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice effect. Don't hurry when applying though
customer_reviews.text: Nice effect. Don't hurry when applying though. I had some runs in my paint cause I sprayed too much too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas Colazzo III

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Both cans dripped more than sprayed. Coat would not go on evenly. Hands covered in paint and the clear was dull. Ended up painting the chrome black with another brand to salvage the look.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it. Please don’t. I purchased thinking “I’m different” just don’t
customer_reviews.text: Def read the reviews. I spent 60 bucks on this paint because I wanted it to cover my motorcycle. It only did he rear fender. I was like ok. I guess I’m going to only have the fender. Then in the first wash.. it all flakes off. I was super irritated
customer_reviews.author: falcon

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it's at least 60 degrees out
customer_reviews.text: Make sure it is at least 60 degrees out before using this. It is the only explanation I can think of. I could tell it may work if it was warmer. Had to use berliner spray paint to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Not true black out
customer_reviews.text: If you want to do 20+ coats or more to actually black out your grill do that. I went through 4 cans for a my bumper and it still looks like sh*t. I followed the directions to a tee. Save your money and just vinyl your chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Smith

customer_reviews.title: CHROME!
customer_reviews.text: If I had chrome wheels would of looked cool but hey sometimes it's experience
customer_reviews.author: seth grener

customer_reviews.title: Horrible chipping even after 3 coats of the clearcoat.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my chrome grill. Damn it looked good on day 1. But a few days later, one drive from work and i saw multiple chips show up. Its been a month or so now and it looks horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Manutd4ever

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this item. I didn’t want to believe the review of how in the end it looks may gray. I followed the instruction to the T, looked at many videos to make sure everything it’s done properly and super disappointed.. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette Valle

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sheen
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to HIGH GLOSS. Everything looks like mate/satin.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: The product works pretty well. You do have to continually clear the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product works pretty well. You do have to continually clear the nozzle (quick spray upside down) or you get some pretty big drops that come out and will look spotty. I blacked-out some 20" chrome rims on and Acura ZDX. I did use it differently than suggested. I sanded all the chrome off, primed, base coats of flat black, then the black translucent (4 coats). It gave the wheels a nice satin finish. Not too shiny, not flat black. Small amount of clear coat for protection. I'd use it again, but wish they had a better spray nozzle. The wheels did come out nicely in spite of the mediocre spray nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: L Cris

customer_reviews.title: High gloss finish for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Really good for the price and its super easy to do just follow the instructions I did this to me is250 to delete all the chrome So far so good definitely recommend 👌 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jesus h.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to apply light enough.
customer_reviews.text: This product was extremely difficult to apply. Spent 5 hrs. on one rim and had to remove with lacquer thinner, put on four coats way to dark.
customer_reviews.author: thomas johnson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on small thin pieces but large pieces are hard to match because of the gradient changes.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Black chrome rocks
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, I got the exact results I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Worked Exactly As It Should.
customer_reviews.text: Came out better than I thought. Read the directions and follow them EXACTLY and you should get the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G Aldini

customer_reviews.title: Odd color
customer_reviews.text: Painted the chrome grille on my truck, it came out with a green tint. It works as described just not my taste. Repainting with matte black
customer_reviews.author: Tim Davis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pealed off chrome very easily soon after curing. Applied as directed exactly!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Klepczyk

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Does not turn out the way it says. Turns out to be a silver color. Not even close to black chrome
customer_reviews.author: Jack Woods

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible finish and I used 3 coats and still couldn't get it to look right.
customer_reviews.author: LaMar Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Follow instructions and there will be no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Need a lot
customer_reviews.text: You need like 3 or 4 to cover all 4 wheels
customer_reviews.author: brayan alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Black- out worked as per instructions. Note: Make sure you shake can for 3 minutes. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Like normal black paint
customer_reviews.text: Didn't turn out like the black chrome pictures online. I did all the prep work to a t
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used this to shadow the housing on my headlights. Had to spray on light coats or else it would run on the unprepped surface.
customer_reviews.author: justinp

customer_reviews.title: Black Out coating Kit
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have found this product. We are using it in our production area and it is exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: b cruz

customer_reviews.title: Needs paint promoter
customer_reviews.text: Instructions and videos forget to add paint promoter.. And no need to sand it..
customer_reviews.author: BossKing

customer_reviews.title: Black Chrome My Azz
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about this product. Looks and sounds nice but didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Turned our great!
customer_reviews.text: rims look great. I hope it holds up! People ask where I bought the rims. I highly recommend this product for a quick upgrade to some old rims.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Anderson

customer_reviews.title: great for motorcycle trim
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for painting my chrome Headlight, side covers and signal lights, and am very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: anthony dimichele

customer_reviews.title: Will not work, do powder coating instead.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this inspite of the reviews. I am a very good painter and this product will not spray evenly no matter what you do. By the time you have it sprayed on evenly the product is now black. I will be emailing or calling Dupli-Color for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Novak

customer_reviews.title: Black Chrome
customer_reviews.text: I like it only used it once...its was splotchy but I think I can fix it...I had to do more than three coats to get the color I wanted and it has a blue tent to it but not bad
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi

customer_reviews.title: Peel off
customer_reviews.text: Eventually peel off no matter how long I spent to sand the surface. Chrome is not easy to paint on anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just bad
customer_reviews.text: OK... not a professional painter, but even though I tried my best, with 3 coats and 20 minutes between them... I just couldn't get a consistent finish. In the early morning or late evening it looks good... but in bright sunlight it just looks bad. I tried touchup... tried more black... then gave up and painted it with the color that matches the truck. Better... but disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Hickabilly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Tried many base colors under this paint could not achieve the black chrome appearance
customer_reviews.author: ben berwager

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but saw some at the auto parts ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product , but saw some at the auto parts store for cheaper price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product from a good company
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intention of adding a black chrome look to some of my cars interior plastic chrome peices, and it did the trick perfect. Its easy to apply and seal and the instructions are very easy to follow to get the look you want. I havent used it on metal and Im pretty sure its not intended for that application but for plastic I couldnt recommend better.
customer_reviews.author: Brandicus

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: ASE certified painting and refinishing which includes painting vehichles for over 15 yrs and I challenge anyone to effectively apply this product with any kind of success. The basecoat layed with a coarse even blotchy appearance. And the nozzle design to shoot an even fan? Expect streaks and skipping. Even cross cutting would not work. At least I did not invest a fortune in this. But then again what should I have expected with that in mind. You are better off passing on any ideas or interest in this product. Save yourself the time and money. Especially the headache of removing it from your project once you've seen the ill results.
customer_reviews.author: Paintinghope

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I didn't have enough to finish my job I had to cut corners because I didn't want to spend another $20 on the kit again
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: The seller got the product to me in good time but the "Shadow chrome" By Dupli- Color is no more than a slightly pigmented clear coat that, no mater how much you shake it comes out spotty and if you apply it wet enough to cover without being spotty you loose the chrome underneath and have to start removing the blackened clear. I've been a professional painter over thirty years and would not recommend this to anyone. The Seller was 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DanO

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and is fast to setup.
customer_reviews.text: Great Idea, and works well. BUT, I am a daily rider rain or shine here in the big city so products don't last very long in my situation. This is great for non-service chrome, you know chrome you don't place you feet on and is just there for visual affect. I dod this on a Krapkuran part as their chrome is not meant to be outside at all. Kuryakyn = Krapkuran, guess it should be Krapkuryakyn.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Orange County Ca.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. the chrome surface is too smooth for the base coat to take. If you want even moderate success, you have to spray NUMEROUS very light coats. If not, the paint will run or result in patches. If you want to blacken your chrome, you are better off sanding, priming and painting properly.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Product should tell you to get prep spray with it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product should tell you to get prep spray with it in description or make it a part of the combo pak. Product doesn't adhear no matter how well you prep.
customer_reviews.author: valjeen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, came on time actually earlier then expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product, came on time actually earlier then expected. Just remember it's paint, meaning you will need more than 1 can (1pack) for "4" rims.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyD

customer_reviews.title: Peace of shit
customer_reviews.text: Did not turn out like anything it said it would look if I wanted black paint I would of wheat to lowe's DON'T WASTE UR MONEY!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: 85shortwide

customer_reviews.title: This is theeeee S***!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works so legit! It's honestly way worth the money!!! BUY IT NOW!!!!! One happy ass customer!! (: my honda looks like it got brand new rims on it! definitely worth it! -Brandi Sandoval(:
customer_reviews.author: Bee_lovebug

customer_reviews.title: I was wary of the bad review before I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, period. I was wary of the bad review before I bought it, but saw the demo on youtube and it looked easy. I'm telling you, it is IMPOSSIBLE to achieve the look. It will turn out splotchy and even if you somehow managed to do it, the color will be like greenish. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Superman

customer_reviews.title: Honestly I wish I could reverse the damage this product ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I wish I could reverse the damage this product has done. If you buy this product be sure to completely take off the wheel before applying and lay the wheel flat before spraying, it is very runny and does not set very well at all. Once it finally sets its a complete mess on your chrome wheels, I am going to go over it with plasti-dip and to cover up the mess this product has created. Once again, you get what you pay for. I tried to take it off with brake cleaner but was unable to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Dupli-color  Shadow Chrome
customer_reviews.text: I got all my wheels off the car & preped & when I opened the paint box the black in both of the packages I purchased looked liked they had been used & sprayed, & black was all over the tops of the cans. I was very disappointed with the condition of the product & will think twice about dealing with Amazon.com again.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: I should of listen to reviews
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a 5 inch by five foot bumper. Used whole can that says it covers 10 sq ft. Turned out grey. Contacted dupli-color and there like oh well, better luck next time . So, junk don't buy it. There kids must be huffing addicts, if they cant throw you one can of paint for there **** up. If I could do no stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: even though it look good n hopping it will do the job
customer_reviews.text: I have the package but I haven't use it yet.even though it look good n hopping it will do the job...thanks
customer_reviews.author: quincy

customer_reviews.title: Maybe with more time to deal with the trial and error it would do a better job. The first use came out very blotchy
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work well, at least for me. Maybe with more time to deal with the trial and error it would do a better job. The first use came out very blotchy, and by the time was able to get rid of the blotchy look it looked like I painted it black.
customer_reviews.author: IhavethebestwifeEVER!

customer_reviews.title: crap.
customer_reviews.text: Paint is crap. I am decent with a pain can and this went on like crap and looked .... crap. Not even enough to do 4 rims. Clear coat looked matte and speckled. The spray was all spattered and un-even. Waste of money. I wish I could get a refund.

customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. What more can I say. But I need to hit the minimum word count thus explaining this last sentence

product_meta.title: Dupli-Color Shadow Chrome Black-Out Coating Kit (SHD1000)
product_meta.description: The Dupli-Color Scratch Fix All-in-1 touch-up tool features an abrasive prep tip, exact-color match paint, and clear coat. We are the only brand with colors tested and approved by vehicle manufacturers for a perfect match to the original factory finish when restoring that scratch or chip. The New Scratch Fix All-in-1 tool helps you fix it easy and fix it right in your garage.
feature_bullets: Through Creativity, Productivity And Innovation - This Brand Continues To Develop The Finest Automotive Accessories
The Dupli-Color Scratch Fix All-In-1 Touch-Up Tool Features An Abrasive Prep Tip, Exact-Color Match Paint, And Clear Coat
We Are The Only Brand With Colors Tested And Approved By Vehicle Manufacturers For A Perfect Match To The Original Factory Finish When Restoring That Scratch Or Chip

specifications.Cover Included: Auto part, Automotive Accessories, Replacement and Performance parts
